  return {\r
    parkingName: record.\uC8FC\uCC28\uC7A5\uBA85,\r
    parkingType: record.\uC8FC\uCC28\uC7A5\uAD6C\uBD84,\r

    feeInfo: record.\uC694\uAE08\uC815\uBCF4,\r
    latitude: record.\uC704\uB3C4,\r
    longitude: record.\uACBD\uB3C4,\r
  };\r
});\r
\r
fs.writeFileSync(\r
  "../data/processedData.json",\r
  JSON.stringify(processedData, null, 2)\r
);
